thread.title: Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment

title: Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment
text: Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Spoof ... Gigi Hadid has been vocal on body shaming. Picture: Getty GIGI Hadid has been immortalised in a South Park episode where she takes on body shamers. The supermodel took to Twitter after it aired. Hadid, 20, appeared on an episode in which Eric Cartman quits Twitter because of body shaming. Gigi Hadid on South Park “I’ve been informed that I was on South Park this week for aprox 5 seconds ... so that’s officially the most iconic 5 seconds of my existence,” Hadid wrote on Twitter. I've been informed that I was on South Park this week for aprox 5 seconds.. soo that's officially the most iconic 5 seconds of my existence. — Gigi Hadid (@GiGiHadid) October 23, 2015 A wise man once said, "f 'em if they can't take a joke." — Gigi Hadid (@GiGiHadid) October 23, 2015 Hadid was clearly able to see the funny side of the episode, even if the animated version of herself looked a little trashy. She was joined in the episode by animations of Demi Lovato, Vin Diesel and Steven Seagal. Celebfest ... Versions of Gigi Hadid and Demi Lovato have appeared in South Park. Picture: Supplied None of the other celebrities who appeared in the episode have commented. Other Stories
